deposit(uint256).details: Deposit stablecoin to the vault, the total supply of the vault includes not only tokens deposited by users, but also tokens transferred  to the vault

recoverERC20(address,uint256).details: this one is used to recover tokens sent to the vault by mistake, including both SAFE and USD ones

totalSupply().details: total supply, used to determine the price of the SAFE token, deposited on SAFE purchase + transferred to the vault

userdoc.notice: This contract is responsible for the stablecoin pool: mainly deposit/withdrawal and farms management
